title: The 'Aishwarya' Ruby and Diamond Kada Bangle
features: Intricately crafted floral motifs along the bangle, converging to a prominent eye shaped central design. The center features a bezel set ruby cabochon, surrounded by smaller diamonds and leaf like designs, all set in open settings. The body features a detailed filigree work and mill grain edging.
occasions: and upscale festive celebrations like Diwali
description: This unique bangle blends modern aesthetic with traditional artistry. The 'Aishwarya' kada is a statement piece, embodying heritage, luxury, and protection (Evil Eye Motif). The open setting lets in the light in order to enhance the diamond clarity and brilliance. Crafted by skilled artisans of Hyderabad, this jewelry piece ensures heirloom quality and stands as a timeless treasure.
